libraries

```{r}
library(randomForest)
library(caret)
set.seed(1)

npfm2 <- read.csv("npf_train2mean_low.csv")
rownames(npfm2) <- npfm2[,"date"]
npfm2 <- npfm2[,-1]

train_mean2 <- npfm2[ idx,]
test_mean2 <- npfm2[-idx,]

```

## Multi-class accuracy (class4)

Multiclass accuracy on the random forest classifier:

```{r}
rF_mean2 <- randomForest(formula = factor(class4) ~ ., 
                             data=train_mean2,
                             ntree=1000, importance=T,
                             proximity=T)

pred2 <- predict(rF_mean2, newdata = test_mean2)
confusionMatrix(factor(test_mean2$class4), pred2)
rF_mean2$confusion

a <- confusionMatrix(factor(test_mean2$class4), pred2)$overall
a[1] 
#Accuracy 
#0.647541

```
